info.title: Dot Prediction API
info.description: A unified API for accessing prediction market data across Kalshi, Polymarket, and Limitless.

get.description: Returns a paginated list of prediction markets from the specified provider. Supports filtering by status and full-text search.

parameters.name: provider
parameters.description: The prediction market platform to query.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of markets to return.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor from a previous response's `next_cursor` field.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter markets by status (e.g., `open`, `closed`, `settled`).

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Full-text search query to filter markets by title or description.

parameters.name: include_raw
parameters.description: Include the raw provider response in the output. Set to `true` to enable.

get.description: Returns detailed information about a specific market by its ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The market ID (platform-specific identifier).

parameters.name: provider
parameters.description: The prediction market platform to query.

parameters.name: include_raw
parameters.description: Include the raw provider response.

get.description: Returns the current order book (bids and asks) for a specific market. Includes depth information for both Yes and No outcomes.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The market ID.

parameters.name: provider
parameters.description: The prediction market platform to query.

parameters.name: include_raw
parameters.description: Include the raw provider response.

get.description: Returns a paginated list of trades for a specific market. Available for Kalshi and Polymarket only (not supported by Limitless).

parameters.name: market_id
parameters.description: The market ID to fetch trades for.

parameters.name: provider
parameters.description: The prediction market platform to query.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of trades to return.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor from a previous response.

parameters.name: takerOnly
parameters.description: Only return taker trades.

get.description: Returns OHLC price history data for one or more markets. Supports configurable time intervals and includes bid/ask spread data.

parameters.name: market_ids
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of market IDs (maximum 10).

parameters.name: start_ts
parameters.description: Start timestamp (Unix epoch).

parameters.name: end_ts
parameters.description: End timestamp (Unix epoch).

parameters.name: provider
parameters.description: The prediction market platform to query.

parameters.name: interval
parameters.description: Candlestick interval in minutes. `1` = 1 minute, `60` = 1 hour, `1440` = 1 day.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of data points to return (max 5000).

get.description: Returns a paginated list of events. Events group related markets together. Available for Kalshi and Polymarket only.

parameters.name: provider
parameters.description: The prediction market platform to query.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of events to return.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Full-text search query.

parameters.name: include_raw
parameters.description: Include the raw provider response.

parameters.name: include_nested
parameters.description: Include nested market data within each event.

get.description: Returns detailed information about a specific event, optionally including its nested markets.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The event ID.

parameters.name: provider
parameters.description: The prediction market platform to query.

parameters.name: include_raw
parameters.description: Include the raw provider response.

parameters.name: include_nested
parameters.description: Include nested market data.

get.description: Returns a paginated list of series. A series is a top-level grouping of related events and markets. Available for Kalshi and Polymarket only.

parameters.name: provider
parameters.description: The prediction market platform to query.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of series to return.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Full-text search query.

parameters.name: include_raw
parameters.description: Include the raw provider response.

parameters.name: include_nested
parameters.description: Include nested event and market data.

get.description: Returns detailed information about a specific series, optionally including nested events and markets.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The series ID.

parameters.name: provider
parameters.description: The prediction market platform to query.

parameters.name: include_raw
parameters.description: Include the raw provider response.

parameters.name: include_nested
parameters.description: Include nested event and market data.

get.description: Returns profile information for a user on the specified prediction market platform. Optionally includes trading metrics like volume, PnL, and ROI.

parameters.name: provider
parameters.description: The prediction market platform.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: The user identifier on the platform (username or address).

parameters.name: include_metrics
parameters.description: Include trading metrics (volume, PnL, ROI, portfolio value).

get.description: Returns a paginated list of trades made by a specific user on the specified platform.

parameters.name: provider
parameters.description: The prediction market platform.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: The user identifier on the platform.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of trades to return.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor.

200.description: A paginated list of user trades.

get.description: Returns profit and loss data over time for a specific user. Supports configurable time granularity and optional date range filtering.

parameters.name: provider
parameters.description: The prediction market platform.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: The user identifier on the platform (username or address).

parameters.name: granularity
parameters.description: Time granularity for PnL data points.

parameters.name: start_time
parameters.description: Start timestamp (Unix epoch) for filtering PnL data.

parameters.name: end_time
parameters.description: End timestamp (Unix epoch) for filtering PnL data.

get.description: Returns a paginated list of active token positions held by a specific user on the specified platform.

parameters.name: provider
parameters.description: The prediction market platform.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: The user identifier on the platform (username or address).

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of positions to return.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor from a previous response.

200.description: A paginated list of user positions.

get.description: Returns a paginated list of merge, split, and redeem activity for a specific user. Supports filtering by market and date range.

parameters.name: provider
parameters.description: The prediction market platform.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: The user identifier on the platform (username or address).

parameters.name: market_id
parameters.description: Filter activity by market ID.

parameters.name: start_time
parameters.description: Start timestamp (Unix epoch) for filtering activity.

parameters.name: end_time
parameters.description: End timestamp (Unix epoch) for filtering activity.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of activities to return.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Pagination cursor from a previous response.

200.description: A paginated list of user activities.

get.description: Returns the health status of the API, including database connectivity and uptime.
Returns a list of all supported prediction market platforms and their capabilities.

apiKey.name: X-API-Key
apiKey.description: API key for authentication. Generate one via the dashboard or the `/v1/api/auth/api-keys` endpoint.

RateLimited.description: Rate limit exceeded. Check the `Retry-After` header.

next_cursor.description: Cursor to use for the next page. `null` if no more results.

cache_hit.description: Whether the response was served from cache.

data_freshness.description: Timestamp indicating when the data was last refreshed.

market_type.description: Type of market (e.g., binary, multiple choice).

last_synced_at.description: When this market data was last synced.

volume_24h.description: Trading volume in the last 24 hours.

volume_7d.description: Trading volume in the last 7 days.

source_url.description: URL to the market on the source platform.

price_24h_changes.description: Price changes over the last 24 hours by outcome.

price_7d_changes.description: Price changes over the last 7 days by outcome.

depth.description: Total depth of the order book side.

yes.description: Order book for the Yes outcome.

no.description: Order book for the No outcome.

taker.description: Whether this was a taker trade.

market_count.description: Number of markets in this event.

total_volume.description: Total trading volume across all markets.

event_count.description: Number of events in this series.

total_volume.description: Total trading volume across all events.

timestamp.description: Unix timestamp for this data point.

cumulative_pnl.description: Cumulative profit/loss up to this point.

granularity.description: Time granularity of the data points.

pnl_over_time.description: PnL data points over the requested time range.

redeemable.description: Whether this position can be redeemed.

market_status.description: Current market status (e.g., open, closed, resolved).

winning_outcome.description: Winning outcome if market is resolved, null otherwise.

resolution.description: Suggested action to resolve the error.
